trans-unit.source: Represents an item in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> in that it displays a list of items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 제어는 비슷합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> 항목의 목록을 표시 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The main difference is that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control provides a number of different ways items can be viewed by the user.
trans-unit.target: 주요 차이점은는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 컨트롤은 사용자가 다양 한 방법 항목의 수를 볼 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> class defines the appearance, behavior, and data associated with an item that is displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 모양, 동작 및 데이터에 표시 되는 항목에 연결 된 클래스 정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects can be displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in one of four different views.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 개체에 표시 될 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 네 가지 뷰 중 하나에서 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Items can be displayed as large or small icons or as small icons in a vertical list.
trans-unit.target: 큰 아이콘 또는 작은 아이콘 또는 작은 아이콘 세로 목록에 항목을 표시할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Items can also have subitems that contain information that is related to the parent item.
trans-unit.target: 항목에는 부모 항목과 관련 된 정보를 포함 하는 하위 항목을 포함할 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The fourth view style, details view, allows you to display the item and its subitems in a grid with column headers that can be used to identify the information being displayed in a subitem.
trans-unit.target: 네 번째 보기 스타일 세부 정보 보기를 사용 하면 있습니다 하위 항목에 표시 되는 정보를 식별 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 열 머리글과 함께 표에 해당 하위 항목을 표시할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Most of the properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> class provide ways to change the display of the item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 속성 중 대부분은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 클래스에 있는 항목의 표시를 변경 하는 방법을 제공는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 연결 된 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A> properties allow you to change how the text of the item is displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A> 속성을 사용 하는 항목의 텍스트에 표시 되는 방식을 변경할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> property allows you to specify the image to load from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> that is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control (by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> 속성에서 로드할 이미지를 지정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> 에 할당 된는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 컨트롤 (설정 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>).

trans-unit.source: Items can display check boxes in order to obtain item choices from the user in a way similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 항목 수와 유사한 방식으로 사용자의 선택 항목이 얻기 위해 확인란을 표시 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Checked%2A> property to determine if an item is checked, or to select or clear the check box at run time.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Checked%2A> 속성 항목 체크 확인 하려면 또는를 선택 하거나 런타임에 확인란의 선택을 취소 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Items can display any number of subitems when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details> and columns are defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 항목에는 원하는 만큼 표시할 수 있습니다 때 하위는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> 속성은 연결 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 로 설정 되어 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details> 에 정의 된 열 및는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can add subitems to an item by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하 여 항목에 하위 항목을 추가할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection.Add%2A> 의 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.SubItems%2A> property allows you to gain access to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection> class and its members.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.SubItems%2A> 속성에 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection> 클래스 및 해당 멤버입니다.

trans-unit.source: Some of the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> class are item-specific versions of properties and methods in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 메서드와 속성 중 일부는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 클래스는 속성 및 메서드 항목에 고유한 버전의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.EnsureVisible%2A> method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> version of the method, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> version affects only the current item.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.EnsureVisible%2A> 메서드는 비슷합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 버전의 메서드, 되지만 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 버전에 현재 항목에만 영향을 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> class also provides methods that are not versions of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 클래스에는 아닌 버전의 메서드를 제공 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BeginEdit%2A> method places the item's text into edit mode so the user can change the item's text (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BeginEdit%2A> 메서드 사용자 항목의 텍스트를 변경할 수 있도록 항목의 텍스트 편집 모드에 배치 (때는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 로 설정 되어 `true`).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Clone%2A> method allows you to create copies of existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects to reuse in other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Clone%2A> 방법의 기존 복사본을 만들 수 있도록 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 다른에서 다시 사용할 수 있는 개체 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control with three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects specified and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> objects specified for each item.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 3 개 컨트롤 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 지정 된 개체 및 3 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> 각 항목에 대해 지정 된 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The example also creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects to display the subitems in details view.
trans-unit.target: 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> 자세히 보기의 하위 항목을 표시 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> 개체에 대 한 이미지를 제공 하는 코드 예제에서는 만들어집니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> 개체에 추가 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> 속성입니다.

The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control with three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects specified and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> objects specified for each item.

trans-unit.source: The text to display for the item.
This should not exceed 259 characters.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> class with the specified item text.
The text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> should not exceed 259 characters or unexpected behavior could occur.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 259 자를 초과 하지 않아야 하거나 예기치 않은 동작이 발생할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of strings that represent the subitems of the new item.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> class with an array of strings representing subitems.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup" /> to assign the item to.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> class and assigns it to the specified group.
This version of the constructor allows you to specify the group to which an item belongs.
trans-unit.target: 이 버전의 생성자를 사용 하는 항목이 속한 그룹을 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> groups are only available on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family ([!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 그룹은 Windows XP 및 Windows Server 2003 제품군에서 사용할 수 있는 에서만 ([!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)]).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> 개요 항목입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> containing information about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> to be initialized.
A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that indicates the source destination and context information of a serialized stream.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> class with the specified serialization information and streaming context.
The text to display for the item.
This should not exceed 259 characters.
The zero-based index of the image within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> that contains the item.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> class with the specified item text and the image index position of the item's icon.
The text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> should not exceed 259 characters or unexpected behavior could occur.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 259 자를 초과 하지 않아야 하거나 예기치 않은 동작이 발생할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The text to display for the item.
This should not exceed 259 characters.

The name of the image within the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageList" /> of the owning <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> to display in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> class with the specified text and image.

The `imageKey` parameter specifies an image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageList%2A> associated with the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, which can be accessed with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `imageKey` 에서 이미지를 지정 하는 매개 변수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageList%2A> 소유 하 고 있는 연관 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 사용 하 여 액세스할 수 있는 컨트롤을는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageList%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> should not exceed 259 characters or unexpected behavior could occur.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 259 자를 초과 하지 않아야 하거나 예기치 않은 동작이 발생할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The text to display for the item.
This should not exceed 259 characters.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup" /> to assign the item to.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> class with the specified item text and assigns it to the specified group.
This version of the constructor allows you to specify the group to which an item belongs.
trans-unit.target: 이 버전의 생성자를 사용 하는 항목이 속한 그룹을 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.target: 텍스트는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 259 자를 초과 하지 않아야 하거나 예기치 않은 동작이 발생할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of strings that represent the subitems of the new item.
The zero-based index of the image within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> that contains the item.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> class with the image index position of the item's icon and an array of strings representing subitems.
An array containing the text of the subitems of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" />.

The name of the image within the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageList" /> of the owning <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> to display in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> class with the specified item and subitem text and image.

The `imageKey` parameter specifies an image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageList%2A> associated with the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, which can be accessed with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `imageKey` 에서 이미지를 지정 하는 매개 변수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageList%2A> 소유 하 고 있는 연관 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 사용 하 여 액세스할 수 있는 컨트롤을는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageList%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of strings that represent the subitems of the new item.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup" /> to assign the item to.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> class with an array of strings representing subitems, and assigns the item to the specified group.
This version of the constructor allows you to specify the group to which an item belongs.
trans-unit.target: 이 버전의 생성자를 사용 하는 항목이 속한 그룹을 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 그룹은 Windows XP 및 Windows Server 2003 제품군에서 사용할 수 있는 에서만 ([!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)]).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup> 개요 항목입니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem" /> that represents the subitems of the item.
The zero-based index of the image within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> that contains the item.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> class with the image index position of the item's icon and an array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem" /> objects.

This version of the constructor is useful when you create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> objects before adding them to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> (for example, to indicate special formatting or to use the subitems in multiple items).
trans-unit.target: 생성자의이 버전은 만들 때 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> 개체를 추가 하기 전에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> (예: 특정 형식이 나타내려면 또는 여러 항목에 하위 항목을 사용 하도록).

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem" /> objects.

The name of the image within the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageList" /> of the owning <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> to display in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> class with the specified subitems and image.

The `imageKey` parameter specifies an image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageList%2A> associated with the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, which can be accessed with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `imageKey` 에서 이미지를 지정 하는 매개 변수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageList%2A> 소유 하 고 있는 연관 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 사용 하 여 액세스할 수 있는 컨트롤을는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageList%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The text to display for the item.
This should not exceed 259 characters.
The zero-based index of the image within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> that contains the item.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroup" /> to assign the item to.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> class with the specified item text and the image index position of the item's icon, and assigns the item to the specified group.
This version of the constructor allows you to specify the group to which an item belongs.
trans-unit.target: 이 버전의 생성자를 사용 하는 항목이 속한 그룹을 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of strings that represent the subitems of the new item.
The zero-based index of the image within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> that contains the item.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the foreground color of the item.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the item.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> that represents the font to display the item's text in.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> class with the image index position of the item's icon; the foreground color, background color, and font of the item; and an array of strings representing subitems.

The following code example creates a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control that manually sorts items when a column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 포함 된 폼을 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 수동으로 때 열에 항목을 정렬 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 컨트롤을 클릭 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface that performs the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> comparison.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제에서는 클래스를 정의 `ListViewItemComparer` 구현 하는 <xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType> 수행 하는 인터페이스는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 비교 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 이 예에서는 인스턴스를 만듭니다 `ListViewItemComparer` 사용 하 여 설정 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> 속성의는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> method call in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> 메서드 호출의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> 이벤트 처리기에 정의 된 메서드를 사용 하 여 `ListViewItemComparer` 항목을 클릭 한 열에 따라 정렬 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of strings that represent the text of the subitems for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" />.

A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to the item text.
